ComicInfo.Title: Hungry For Heroes! (Or A Sandwich To Die For!)
ComicInfo.Summary: Hungry For Heroes! (Or A Sandwich To Die For!): While spending a day with his mom, Kevin Green becomes Prime to save New York from a sea creature released by Atalon, King Of The Fire People.
